channel.title: Php Import
channel.description:
ok go [url=http://www.tonyhawkpunks.com/rs_stats_forum.php]here[/url] and look at the little box and the get stats button
i want to put that in my index.HTML so that its like the loggin box so that people can use it from my index than having to go to that ugly page how would i do this?
IF THIS IS NOT ALOAD TO BE ASKED (PWND :mad:) THAN TELL ME

item.title: Php Import
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

[quote=“RXVL, post:6, topic:164782”]SO FUCKING CHANGE IT TO .PHP

FFS, you need it to be a .php to work.[/quote]

He might not know how…

[quote=“xXx JAVA OWNZ U xXx, post:5, topic:164782”]my index?
well im not good with php, and my index is html[/quote]

Edit the index.html file in notepad or another program like it, then click 'Save As…" and save it as “index.php” instead of “index.html” that will fix all of your problems.

Okay… not all of them, but the one that you are having right now…

-Alexia

Read full topic

item.title: Php Import
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

ERROR 404 - PAGE NOT FOUND
Oops! Looks like the page you’re looking for was moved or never existed.
Make sure you typed the correct URL or followed a valid link.

and you would just change the page to a .php and add
[php]

<?php include 'filename.php'; ?>

[/php]
wherever you want it to appear if I understand you correctly.

Read full topic
